Interface RoomInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Room

    public interface RoomInterface
    The Interface for a room.

      • genValidRoom

        RoomInterface genValidRoom(java.util.Random rand,
                           Tile[][] grid)
        Gen valid room. meaning it doesn't overlap another room in the grid.
        Parameters:
        rand - Random to use when generating
        grid - Tile[][] that is used to manage
        Returns:
        RoomInterface of a valid room
